column1: Kata Robata////The sushi was excellent (we had the Caribbean
column3: and soft shell crab and salmon rolls)
column4: and we also enjoyed the duck dumpling ramen.  BUT
column5: the wait was forever!!  Without reservations
column6: our wait was about an hour
column7: and it took them another 30 minutes after we were seated to bring us our first sushi roll.  While the quality of the food was great
column8: I wouldn't return without reservations again--the wait wasn't worth it.
